explains: adj. 未满学龄的；就学前的，入学前的
wordGroup: preschool education 学前教育，幼儿教育

sentences.en: Ear infections are common in preschool children.
sentences.cn: 耳朵感染在学前儿童中很常见。

sentences.en: Looking after preschool children is very tiring.
sentences.cn: 照顾学龄前儿童很累人。

sentences.en: The report emphasized the value of a preschool education.
sentences.cn: 该报告强调了学龄前教育的价值。
